user_story: As a manager, I want to interact with the Large Language Model (LLM) assistant through well-crafted prompts or queries, in order to receive accurate and relevant responses.
description: The system should be able to integrate with the LLM, enabling managers to interact with the assistant through well-crafted prompts or queries. The LLM should be able to provide accurate and relevant responses based on the stored data. Successfully integrated LLM is essential for the system to provide valuable insights.

user_story: As a system administrator, I want to convert translated data into a structured format, in order to enable Large Language Model (LLM) integration.
description: The system should be able to convert the translated data into a structured format, including categorizing and normalizing the data. The structured data should be stored in a vector database like MongoDB for efficient querying and analysis. Successfully structured data is essential for the system to integrate with the LLM.

user_story: As a system administrator, I want to translate extracted content into English, in order to enable internal processing.
description: The system should be able to translate the extracted content from various languages into English. The translated content should be stored in a separate repository for further processing. Successfully translated content is crucial for the system to structure and analyze the data.

user_story: As a system administrator, I want to store structured data in a vector database, in order to enable efficient querying and analysis.
description: The system should be able to store the structured data in a vector database like MongoDB, ensuring efficient querying and analysis capabilities. The database should be scalable and secure to handle large volumes of data. Successfully stored data is crucial for the system to provide accurate insights.

user_story: As a system administrator, I want to extract content from received PDFs, in order to prepare data for translation.
description: The system should be able to extract content from the received PDFs, including text, tables, and images. The extracted content should be stored in a temporary repository for further processing. Successfully extracted content is essential for the system to translate and structure the data.

user_story: As a developer, I want to provide APIs for the team to upload PDFs and perform detailed insights on historical data and various offers, in order to enhance data analysis capabilities.
description: The system should be able to provide APIs for uploading PDFs and performing detailed insights on historical data and various offers. The APIs should be secure, scalable, and well-documented to enable seamless integration with other systems.

user_story: As a developer, I want to enable deeper analysis of historical data and trends, in order to optimize procurement and cost management.
description: The system should be able to enable deeper analysis of historical data and trends, including identifying patterns and anomalies. The system should be able to provide actionable insights and recommendations for optimizing procurement and cost management.

user_story: As a system administrator, I want to receive PDFs from various vendors, in order to extract relevant data for analysis.
description: The system should be able to receive PDFs from different vendors, either manually uploaded by users or automatically fetched through integrations. The PDFs should be stored in a designated repository for further processing. Successfully receiving and storing PDFs is crucial for the system to extract relevant data.

user_story: As a system administrator, I want to handle errors and exceptions during PDF extraction, translation, and data structuring, in order to ensure system reliability.
description: The system should be able to handle errors and exceptions during PDF extraction, translation, and data structuring. The system should be able to log errors, notify administrators, and provide debugging information for quick issue resolution.

user_story: As a system administrator, I want to generate reports and analytics on supplier performance, menu costs, and resource allocation, in order to facilitate data-driven decision-making.
description: The system should be able to generate reports and analytics on supplier performance, menu costs, and resource allocation. The system should be able to customize reports based on user roles and requirements.

user_story: As a manager, I want to log in to the system securely, in order to access insights and make informed decisions.
description: The system should be able to authenticate managers securely, ensuring role-based access control and secure data transmission. The system should be able to log access attempts and notify administrators of suspicious activity.

user_story: As a manager, I want to retrieve the required ingredients and their quantities for making 10 dishes of lasagna, in order to plan menu costs.
description: The system should be able to provide the required ingredients and their quantities for making 10 dishes of lasagna based on the stored data. The system should be able to calculate the total cost of the ingredients and provide the results in a user-friendly format.

user_story: As a manager, I want to identify which supplier offers the best rates and deals for making pasta this month, in order to optimize procurement.
description: The system should be able to compare prices and deals from different suppliers for making pasta this month based on the stored data. The system should be able to provide a ranking of suppliers based on the best rates and deals.

user_story: As a manager, I want to retrieve the recipe for lasagna, list all necessary ingredients, and calculate the cost of preparing 20 plates for the next day, in order to plan menu costs.
description: The system should be able to provide the recipe for lasagna, list all necessary ingredients, and calculate the cost of preparing 20 plates for the next day based on the stored data. The system should be able to provide the results in a user-friendly format.

user_story: As a system administrator, I want to perform system maintenance, backups, and updates, in order to ensure system reliability and performance.
description: The system should be able to perform system maintenance, backups, and updates seamlessly, ensuring minimal downtime and data loss. The system should be able to notify administrators of scheduled maintenance and provide detailed logs for troubleshooting.

user_story: As a manager, I want to receive notifications and alerts for price changes, new offers, and supplier updates, in order to stay informed about market trends.
description: The system should be able to send notifications and alerts to managers for price changes, new offers, and supplier updates. The system should be able to customize notification preferences based on user roles and requirements.
